data.name: Man O' War: Corsair - Fledgling Griffon
data.detailed_description:
The majestic Fledgling Griffon is a morale booster for your crew. They are a superstitious lot and this beautiful creature is regarded as a sign of good luck!

(Note: This DLC was free for everyone purchasing Man O' War: Corsair during Early Access.)

To activate: This DLC unlocks a special ship upgrade in ports for human captains. Visit the shipwright's in any port to hire a fledgling griffon for your ship.
